summary: A fully Craftable, Upgradeable and Enchantable Dawnbreaker Sword.
descriptionHtml:
Thank you for downloading and trying SoulMasters Dawnbreaker.

I know there are a few mods based around the Dawnbreaker Sword, but as it is my favourite Sword I decided to do my own mod.

I was never very happy with the Swords damage, I always thought it should be higher. Also I didn\'t like the fact that you were stuck with the Enchantment that came with the original.

Now with SoulMasters Dawnbreaker Sword:

[color=#00FF00]The Sword is Craftable at a Forge (under Misc - Requires Daedric Smithing perk)
Can be upgraded at a Grindstone (Requires Arcane Smithing Perk)
You can Enchant it with any Enchantment
Purchasable from any Blacksmith if you are level 15 or over.[/color]

[color=#FFFF00]Installation:
Install with Nexus Mod Manager.
To install manually just drop the .esp file in to your Skyrim Data folder.[/color]

Please feel free to leave any comments, bug reports etc.

I hope you enjoy using SoulMasters Dawnbreaker!

[color=#00FFFF]Please take note: If you are using a pirated (ie non Steam enabled) version of the game, please do not leave comments about how this part of my mod or that is not working on your game! I am not prepared to waste my time trying to help you out with your illegal software! I\'m unemployed, but still manage to pay for my games (they are what keep me sane) so if I can, you should be able to as well![/color]

SoulMasterII

[IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p535/mike_patrick1/sm0g9rv24znf_zps9d795d9a.gif[/IMG]

[color=#FFFF00]Please, DO NOT upload any part of my mods anywhere else![/color]
author: SoulMasterII
